onboarding-desc-1: Dibba is live-menu sharing app designed to connect you with local small-scale eateries. Discover daily-updated menus, support community businesses, and find your perfect dibba for lunch and dinner!
onboarding-desc-2: Living away from home and relying on local parcel points? Dibba is the perfect solution for discovering nearby food joints and exploring their offerings. Easily add your favorite spots, search by name or menu items, and indulge in a variety of authentic flavors at your fingertips.
